EquipmentRings31.name: EquipmentRings31
EquipmentRings31.desc: All kills in World 3 count for 1.30x for opening portals to the next map. Helps you get to World 5 faster! 30% Faster to be exact!

EquipmentHats82.name: EquipmentHats82
EquipmentHats82.desc: You can't be a real sorcerer without a big wizard hat! Comes with a +5% All Stats bonus, so your STR AGI WIS LUK will be in good hands!

EquipmentPendant28.name: EquipmentPendant28
EquipmentPendant28.desc: This necklace equipment comes with +35% Class EXP bonus, +5% Mob Respawn bonus, +3 Weapon Power, and +10 all stat!

Island1.name: Island1
Island1.desc: Instantly gain 10 bottles for buying new Island Expeditions at the Deepwater Docks. These will be directly added to your total.

Pearl5.name: Pearl5
Pearl5.desc: Bro someone just like, dropped these off here. I have NO idea where they've been, if you want them just take them. Well, gimme a gem at the very least and they're yours!

desc: 100 arcade balls. Use these at the Arcade, found at the clown in World 2 town! +20% better value compared to smol ball pack!
100 regular Arcade balls, but at a 33% Discounted Price! Great for getting more gold balls to buy upgrades with!
Use this on a 4 star card to upgrade it to 5 stars! It works like 4 star cardifiers do, you get to choose which card gets upgraded, no randomness involved!! Yippie!!!
20% OFF, usually costs 480! Use this on a 4 star card to upgrade it to 5 stars! It works like 4 star cardifiers, you get to choose which card gets upgraded, no randomness involved!
